title: Ather Energy logs 12-fold increase October sales
description: "The festive season has been very encouraging for us as Ather Energy recorded a 12 fold growth in sales in the month of October, when compared to last year," Ather Energy CEO and Co-founder Tarun Mehta said in a statement.
